name: yourls
tagline: A self-hosted URL shortener with statistics
description: YOURLS is a self-hosted URL shortener that generates short links with optional custom keywords and stats. It supports plugins, APIs, and multiple users, offering a private alternative to public shortening services.

features.title: Private Or Public
features.description: Run as a private shortener for personal use or open it to the public with

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with community plugins for features like QR codes, previews, and integrations

features.title: REST API
features.description: Shorten URLs programmatically using the REST API for automation and third-party integrations

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Create accounts for team members with individual statistics and link management

features.title: Link Management
features.description: Edit, delete, or update destination URLs for existing short links without changing the short URL
